beats: Encrypted telemetry shows anomalous packet loss on the spire's uplink lattice.
Dr. Lyra Keel requests escorts to inspect the Industrial Tier emitters feeding the climate array.
story_seeds.reason: Dr. Lyra Keel eases unrest in Research Spire

resolution_templates.failure: Saboteurs crash the uplink and terraforming cascades into failure.
resolution_templates.partial: Telemetry traces point to the Industrial Tier, but the culprit slips away.
resolution_templates.success: Security purges the leak and climate models return to trusted hands.

story_seeds.stakes: Leaked terraforming telemetry could destabilize the perimeter climate nets.
story_seeds.summary: Stolen climate models hint at sabotage inside the spire.
story_seeds.title: Research Spire Data Leak

beats: Cartel couriers report drones shadowing every cargo convoy leaving the Hollow.
Cassian Mire proposes bribing Union of Flux stewards to reopen maintenance tunnels.

resolution_templates.failure: Security drones seize the lanes and the Cartel loses leverage.
resolution_templates.partial: Bribes buy a few quiet nights, but patrols stay on edge.
resolution_templates.success: Cartel escorts broker a truce and reopen the maintenance tunnels.

director_events.stakes: If the lanes close, Perimeter Hollow starves and unrest spikes citywide.
director_events.summary: Cartel of Mist couriers lose safe passage through Perimeter Hollow.
director_events.title: Smuggling Lanes Exposed

beats: Union of Flux leaders threaten a walkout unless worker grids receive priority amperage.
Aria Volt drafts an emergency ration plan that would divert power from research labs.
director_events.reason: Scarcity in energy, materials strains the city environment

resolution_templates.failure: Workshops go dark, strikers spread, and council legitimacy crashes.
resolution_templates.partial: Convoys buy time but sabotage rumors keep tensions high.
resolution_templates.success: Emergency rationing shares power fairly and the Union backs down.

director_events.stakes: Union of Flux stewards threaten to abandon the grid if outages spread.
director_events.summary: Rolling brownouts push the Industrial Tier toward a credibility crisis.
director_events.title: Energy Quota Fallout
